item.title: Two GTX 580s in SLI are responsible for the AI we have today â€” Nvidia's Huang revealed that the invention of deep learning began with two flagship Fermi GPUs in 2012
item.description: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang revealed in a recent Joe Rogan podcast that the inventors behind deep learning ran the world's first machine learning network on a pair of GTX 580s in SLI in 2012.
